ing: 1 ball of fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced
des: "A greener version of the classic Caprese, this salad is just as delicious with the added nutrients of spinach!  The drizzle of olive oil and balsamic vinegar make a wonderful dressing for the spinach underneath."
ins: Spread the spinach out on a serving plate. Place the slices of tomato on the bed of spinach. Top each slice of tomato with a slice of fresh mozzarella. Sprinkle the basil over the salad and drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
